purpleculture_pinyin:
jiàn
to fulfill (a promise); to tread; to walk
выполнить (обещание); ступать; гулять
rtega_mnemonic:
踐踐RS
践践		trample, tread upon, walk on, fulfil
  • kill with weapons 戔/戋 and subsequently step ⻊ upon it: trample, they are merely fulfilling orders
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 践)
Pictophonetic: 戔 indicates the sound; 足 (foot) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
踐踏 [ jiàn tà ]: to trample
踐行 [ jiàn xíng ]: to practice; to put into practice
踐約 [ jiàn yuē ]: to keep a promise; to honor an agreement

• ⿰ Left to right
    • 足 [ zú ] foot; to attain, to satisfy; enough
    • 戔 [ jiān ] small, narrow; tiny, little
heisig_chinese_memo: The pirate with the wooden leg chased after the parade float and was run over by the next one, leaving tread on marks all over him and his leg.
Ru_trainchinese: jiàn: (графема) исполнять, осуществлять; наступать на, топтать
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pirate with the wooden leg chased after the parade float and was tread on by the next one, leaving tread marks all over him and his leg.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " foot " and " struck ", the original meaning is trample. "Shuowen": "Let's walk. From the feet, hold the sound." "Zhuangzi‧ Horseshoe": "Horse, hoof can slap frost and snow, and hair can protect against wind and cold."

" Practice " can mean walking. Jin Zhang Association "Seven Lives": "(The horse of Tianji) has no time to look at the shape, and there is no time to get up. The floating arrow has not moved, and it will be practiced for thousands of miles."

" Practice " also means to go. Sima Qian of the Han Dynasty (Report to Ren Shaoqing): "Also, Li Ling said that his pawns were less than five thousand, and he practiced the land of the army."

" Practice " also means to achieve. Jin Yingheng's "Poem for the Four Crowns": "Bringing together the four brothers, and practicing twenty-nine in a wonderful year."

" Jian " also means torment and destruction. Tang Lu Guimeng "Zhan Qiu Ci": "Interfering with Bianhu, killing and injuring the barbarians."

" Practice " said implementation. "Songs of the Chu-Heavenly Questions": "Will Chao contend for the alliance, how can you practice my period?

" Practice " also means to take charge and promote. "The Twelve Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "Practice is one's duty, and there is no rebellion against my fate."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " foot " and " struck ", the original meaning is trample.
humanum_full_description:
從「足」，「戔」聲，本義為踩踏。《說文》：「履也。从足，戔聲。」 《莊子‧馬蹄》：「馬，蹄可以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒。」

　　「踐」可表示行走。晉張協〈七命〉：「（天驥之駿）景不及形，塵不暇起。浮箭未移，再踐千里。」

　　「踐」也表示前往。漢司馬遷〈報任少卿書〉：「且李陵提步卒不滿五千，深踐戎馬之地。」

　　「踐」亦表示達到。晉應亨〈贈四王冠詩〉：「濟濟四令弟，妙年踐二九。」

　　「踐」還表示蹂躪、摧殘。唐陸龜蒙〈戰秋辭〉：「擾踐邊胡，殲傷蜑夷。」

　　「踐」也表示實現。《楚辭‧天問》：「會晁爭盟，何踐吾期？」

　　「踐」還指擔當、升任。《左傳‧僖公十二年》：「往踐乃職，無逆朕命。」

從「 足 」，「 戔 」聲，本義為踩踏。《說文》：「履也。从足，戔聲。」 《莊子‧馬蹄》：「馬，蹄可以踐霜雪，毛可以禦風寒。」 「 踐 」可表示行走。晉張協〈七命〉：「（天驥之駿）景不及形，塵不暇起。浮箭未移，再踐千里。」 「 踐 」也表示前往。漢司馬遷〈報任少卿書〉：「且李陵提步卒不滿五千，深踐戎馬之地。」 「 踐 」亦表示達到。晉應亨〈贈四王冠詩〉：「濟濟四令弟，妙年踐二九。」 「 踐 」還表示蹂躪、摧殘。唐陸龜蒙〈戰秋辭〉：「擾踐邊胡，殲傷蜑夷。」 「 踐 」也表示實現。《楚辭‧天問》：「會晁爭盟，何踐吾期？」 「 踐 」還指擔當、升任。《左傳‧僖公十二年》：「往踐乃職，無逆朕命。」
From the sound of " foot" and " struck", the original meaning is trample. "Shuowen": "Let's walk. From the feet, hold the sound." "Zhuangzi‧ Horseshoe": "Horse, hoof can slap frost and snow, and hair can protect against wind and cold." " Practice" can mean walking. Jin Zhang Association "Seven Lives": "(The horse of Tianji) has no time to look at the shape, and there is no time to get up. The floating arrow has not moved, and it will be practiced for thousands of miles." " Practice" also means to go. Sima Qian of the Han Dynasty (Report to Ren Shaoqing): "Also, Li Ling said that his pawns were less than five thousand, and he practiced the land of the army." " Practice" also means to achieve. Jin Yingheng's "Poem for the Four Crowns": "Bringing together the four brothers, and practicing twenty-nine in a wonderful year." " Jian" also means torment and destruction. Tang Lu Guimeng "Zhan Qiu Ci": "Interfering with Bianhu, killing and injuring the barbarians." " Practice" said implementation. "Songs of the Chu-Heavenly Questions": "Will Chao contend for the alliance, how can you practice my period? " Practice" also means to take charge and promote. "The Twelve Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Gong Xi": "Practice is one's duty, and there is no rebellion against my fate."

踐字的基本解释

踐
jiàn
见“践”。

踐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》慈演切，上獮，從。］
“践1”的繁体字。
(1)踩；踩踏。
(2)蹂躏；摧残。
(3)走；行走。
(4)赴；前往。
(5)引申为追求。
(6)及；达到。
(7)经历；经受。
(8)遵循；按照。
(9)履行；实现。
(10)应验。
(11)实践，从事某种工作或活动。
(12)穿，着。特指穿鞋。
(13)登临。
(14)担当；升任。
(15)特指登基，继承帝位。
(16)陈列整齐貌。
(17)通“翦”。灭除；杀戮。
(18)通“淺”。浅陋。
(19)通“善”。良好。
(20)通“跣”。赤脚。
(21)通“餞”。饯送。

踐字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踐； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1227第17
【集韻】才線切，音賤。【說文】履也。【禮·曲禮】修身踐言。【註】踐，履也。　又【博雅】?也。【尚書序】成王東伐淮夷，遂踐奄。【釋文】踐，藉也。　又【玉篇】行也。【類篇】列也。【詩·豳風】籩豆有踐。【傳】行列貌。　又【廣韻】蹋踐。【禮·曲禮】毋踐屨。【疏】踐，蹋也。　又【釋名】踐，殘也。使殘壞也。　又【廣韻】慈演切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】在演切，?音餞。義同。　又與善同。【禮·曲禮】日而行事，則必踐之。【註】踐，讀曰善。【疏】踐，善也。言卜得吉而行事，必善也。　又與翦通。【周禮·天官·甸師註】不踐其類也。【釋文】音翦。○按《禮記·文王世子》今作翦。

踐字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
踐字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" Ci Yanqie, on, from. ]
The traditional characters of "践1".
(1) Step on; step on.
(2) Ravaged; devastated.
(3) Walk; walk.
(4) Go; Go.
(5) The extension is pursuit.
(6) And; reach.
(7) Experience; experience.
(8) Follow; follow.
(9) Fulfill; realize.
(10) Fulfilled.
(11) Practice, engage in a certain job or activity.
(12) Wear and wear. Especially wearing shoes.
(13) Boarding.
(14) Responsible; promoted.
(15) In particular, it refers to ascending the throne and inheriting the throne.
(16) The display is neat and tidy.
(17) Through "Jian". Exterminate; kill.
(18) Through "shallow". shallow.
(19) Through "goodness". good.
(20) Through "跣". barefoot.
(21) Through "candied fruit". Give away.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Foot Character Department] 　 Jian; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1227 Page 17
【Jiyun】Only line cut, low sound. [Said the text] Li also. 【Li·Chu Li】Study oneself and practice words. 【Note】Practice, carry on.　[Bo Ya] again? Also. [Shang Shu Preface] Cheng Wang, east of Huai Yi, then practiced his death. 【Explanation】Practice, borrow.　[Jade articles] OK. 【Classes】List also. [Poetry·Binfeng] There is practice in the bean curd. [Biography] Appearance of the ranks.　[Guang Yun] Fuck. 【Rite·Curly】Don’t practice it. 【Sparse】Practice, defile.　 [Release Name] Jian, Can Ye. Destroy also.　[Guangyun] Ci Yanqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] is performing and cutting,? Yin candied. The same meaning.　 Again with kindness. 【Ritual·Courtesy】acting day by day, you must practice it. 【Note】Practice, read as good. 【Sparse】Practice, good. If you say good things and act well, you must be good.　Connect with Jiang again. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan·Dianshi Note】Don’t practice its kind. 【Explanation】Yin Jian. ○Press "Book of Rites·Wen Wang Shizi" for this article.
